components.html: As Pilot-In-Command, I declare that all procedures have been followed and that all reasonable measures have been made to conduct a safe operation. Further, I recognize my responsibility to comply with the Canadian Aviation Regulations and the Operations Manual and that I am personally liable if negligent.
